title: Election Commission declares Dhammika Perera as a Member of Parliament
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has declared Dhammika Perera as a member of Parliament to fill the vacancy caused by the resignation of Basil Rohana Rajapaksa.
Election Commission declares Dhammika Perera as a Member of Parliament
Litro Chairman resigns after less than two months on the job
